item.title: Contact
item.description: If you have any questions about our studio or our games, please ask them here. Your Email: Subject: Your message: Please wait a moment after pressing the【Send Message】button. Send Message

item.title: About
item.description: There are some games that are developed by one person or a small team of only a few people. These developers do not follow the trend, but hope to make the games they really want to make. In these games, there is a “special energy” that cannot be conveyed no matter how much money or manpower is spent. This is a special thing that only that person can make, and it is precisely because of this that it can move many players in the world: this is the independent game we continue to create.

item.title: Game
item.description: ‘Lost Island - Sword of Tisquiet’is a 2D turn-based strategy game inspired by classics like ‘Fire Emblem’. Immerse yourself in an epic world filled with rich lore, dramatic storylines, and a vast cast of unique characters. Master the flexible class-change system, freely customize your skills, and explore a deep crafting and equipment system. Command your forces in tactical battles, as you lead your heroes through a journey of adventure, discovery, and war on the mysterious Lost Island.
